182.question: Do they inspect their model to see if their model learned to associate image parts with words related to entities?

8-Figure3-1.png: Yes, the image shows a visualization of modality attention, which is a part of the model that helps to associate image parts with words related to entities. The visual tags presented in the image are the output of the InceptionNet model, which is used to make final predictions based on weighted signals from all modalities.
